H0.text: In which river is the Boulder Dam. Missouri River

H1.text: In which river is the Boulder Dam. Arkansas River

H2.text: In which river is the Boulder Dam. Rio Grande

H3.text: In which river is the Boulder Dam. Colo.

A4.text: the Boulder Canyon Project, whose key feature would be a dam on the Colorado in Black Canyon 30 miles (48 km) southeast of Las Vegas, Nevada.
